attributes.action: Keep the NHS free to all, at all times, to every person living in Britain.
attributes.additional_details: It has been noted recently that Mr Trump, the current President of the USA, wants to be involved in our Health Service.  Our Health Service is OURS we should not allow any countries or persons outside our own have a say or interfere in its function or running.
attributes.background: The NHS has been free for everyone, with or without personal insurance.  Please keep the NHS free for everyone, no matter what they earn or pay into the system.  Keep the NHS (National Health Service) free for all who live in Great Britain.  Ensure that there is always a free health service for all.
